translation.en: [narrator] Though many know the tragic love story of Antony and Cleopatra,
the wayward Roman general
who fell madly in love with the enchanting Egyptian queen,
translation.ko: 아름다운 이집트 여왕과 깊은 사랑에 빠져

translation.en: both of them taking their lives
rather than face a world without each other,
few know the secret story
of the most sought-after prize and unsolved puzzle of their time.
The mystery of Cleopatra's third egg.
On their wedding day, as a symbol of his undying devotion,
Mark Antony presented Cleopatra with three bejeweled eggs,
translation.ko: 안토니우스는 보석 알 세 개를 가져왔는데

translation.en: each one more exquisite than the last.
For centuries, these eggs were thought to be nothing more than myth, rumor.
translation.ko: 수 세기 동안 루머로만 여겨지던 이야기였죠

translation.en: But then, in 1907,
just outside of Cairo, a local farmer unearthed two of them.
translation.ko: 카이로 외곽에서 한 농부가 두 개를 발견했습니다

translation.en: Some say the third egg was never found.
translation.ko: 세 번째 알은 발견되지 않았다는 말도 있고

translation.en: Others claim it was discovered,
but just as quickly lost, never to be seen again.
Join us as we explore that very question.
What happened to Cleopatra's lost egg?
translation.ko: 클레오파트라의 사라진 알은 어떻게 된 걸까요?

translation.en: Who may hold it in their possession?
And most importantly, will we ever see the day in which
translation.ko: 그리고 언젠가는 세 알이 재회한 광경을

translation.en: all three eggs are reunited for the first time in over 2,000 years?
translation.ko: 2,000년 만에 볼 수 있는 날이 찾아올까요?

translation.en: Cleopatra's first egg is on display for all to see
translation.ko: 클레오파트라의 첫 번째 알이 전시된 곳은

translation.en: at the world-famous Museo Nazionale di Castel Sant'Angelo in Rome.
The second egg has been sold at auction numerous times
translation.ko: 두 번째 알은 수많은 경매를 거쳐

translation.en: and currently is held in a private collection.
You're not a cop.
You're right, I'm not.
You know what I mean, Agent. Your badge is no good here.
So no American cowboy stuff.
Don't worry. Left my chaps at home.
translation.ko: 걱정 말아요 가죽 바지 두고 왔어요

translation.en: You sure about this?
I know how he thinks. He's gonna do it today. Trust me.
translation.ko: 그놈 생각은 뻔하죠 오늘 저지를 거예요

translation.en: All right, then, here we go.
-[man in English] Impossible. -I'm not asking.
You need to shut the museum down, evacuate your visitors,
and seal all ingress and egress points immediately.
And Interpol has the authority to compel me to do so?
translation.ko: 인터폴이 그런 걸 강요할 힘이 있어요?

translation.en: Don't test me, Director.
You should listen to her.
And who are you? Her bodyguard?
This is Special Agent John Hartley of the FBI's Behavioral Analysis Unit.
He's a consulting profiler who specializes in art crime.
You don't look like a profiler.
Yeah, I get that a lot.
Forty-one hours ago, Agent Hartley received credible intelligence that
translation.ko: 41시간 전 하틀리 요원이 입수한 정보에 의하면

translation.en: the most wanted art thief in the world, a man named Nolan Booth,
translation.ko: 세계 최고의 예술품 도둑 놀런 부스란 사람이

translation.en: intends to steal the Egg of Cleopatra today.
Who provided you this information?
The Bishop.
You cannot be serious.
My dear, The Bishop is nothing more than a boogeyman story in the art world.
It's a catch-all concept. It's someone to blame when you and your friends in law enforcement
translation.ko: 경찰이 너무 무능해서 사건 해결 못 할 때

translation.en: are too incompetent to solve the case.
Listen to me, unless we stop it, that egg is gonna be stolen today.
translation.ko: 오늘 막지 못하면 그 알은 도난당해요

translation.en: In fact, it may already be gone.
[in English] Already gone, you say?
Now, if you'll excuse me, Inspector, I believe I owe your supervisor a call.
translation.ko: 용건 마치셨으면 윗분들 사과 전화 기다리겠습니다

translation.en: Do you have thermal sensors in this room?
-Of course we do. -Show it to me.
[director] You're wasting our time.
What, may I ask, are you looking for?
Well, you see, Cleopatra's first egg is covered in 18-karat gold.
translation.ko: 클레오파트라의 첫 번째 알은 18캐럿 황금 도금이고

translation.en: And gold reflects radiation.
That egg should be reflecting the heat in this room.
translation.ko: 이 방의 열을 반사해야 한다는 거죠

translation.en: It should be red, not blue.
It's probably just an error in the thermal sensor.
Well, there's only one way to find out.
Hey, sorry, big man, but there's no food or drink in the museum.
Thank you.
No, no, wait a moment. What do you think you're doing?
[woman] Relax, it's fine. He knows what he's doing.
Seal the room. Now!
Move! Move!
He's heading for the exit.
Freeze!
[guard 1 in Italian] He is here. Send reinforcements.
He's on the scaffolding.
We're gonna need more-- [grunts]
I know you. You're the… You're the slow bald guy that's been chasing me.
translation.ko: 그 친구네 나 쫓아다니는 느린 대머리 친구

translation.en: What do you got in the bag?
You're American. What brings you to Rome?
Gelato, the Colosseum.
-Oh, it's beautiful. Beautiful place. -Yeah.
-First time? -Yep.
[Booth] That was a fun foot chase, right? Lots of twists and turns. Hijinks.
Who knew it'd end up like this?
-I did. -Right.
Fun's over, Nolan Booth. Give me the bag, turn around,
translation.ko: 재미는 끝났어 가방 주고 돌아서 손 뒤로 돌려 널 체포한다

translation.en: put your hands behind your back. You're under arrest.
translation.ko: 가방 주고 돌아서 손 뒤로 돌려 널 체포한다

translation.en: Okay. Well, hold on one sec. I just have two questions.
Okay. Um…
First question, where'd you get that jacket?
translation.ko: 첫 질문, 그 재킷 어디서 샀어?

translation.en: It's a statement piece.
Somewhere there is a very nude cow whispering… [whispers] …"Worth it."
And number two, on the whole arresting me thing, I totally get it.
translation.ko: 두 번째 질문, 체포하는 건 이해해

translation.en: You know, baby did a bad, bad thing. Yeah.
But you don't happen to have, like, a badge or somethin'
tucked away in the turtleneck, do you?
I don't need to show you my badge because I've got a gun.
translation.ko: 난 총 있으니까 안 보여줘도 돼

translation.en: Here's the thing. You're putting me in a pickle.
Without identification, how do I know who you are?
translation.ko: 신원도 안 밝히면 누군지 어떻게 알아?

translation.en: For all I know, you could be the bad guy,
and I could be the other bad guy.
You're right. I am the bad guy.
Now shut up and give me the bag before I shoot you in the mouth.
translation.ko: 이제 가방이나 내놔 주둥이에 총알 박기 전에

translation.en: -I'm gonna give this to you. -[Hartley] Good.
Yeah, I'm just gonna give it to you 'cause I don't even want it.
For the record, none of this feels good.
Booth, don't move!
Come on, let's go.
What the hell?
Where are you going?
Asshole!
[in English] Can you hold on to this for me?
-Thanks. -[sputtering]
[in Italian] What the hell? You idiot! Are you blind?
[Hartley in English] Nice place you got here.
Special Agent John Hartley, FBI. We met earlier.
translation.ko: FBI 존 하틀리 요원 우리 구면이지?

translation.en: Aren't you a little outside your jurisdiction?
I am.
Good thing these guys aren't.
Hi, guys. Don't take your shoes off or anything.
translation.ko: 안녕, 친구들 신발은 안 벗어도 돼

translation.en: You sure you brought enough guns?
What can I say? I like to be thorough.
[Booth] No way, José.
-The intrepid Inspector Das. -[scoffs]
I wouldn't have missed this for the world. I'll take that. Thank you.
translation.ko: 내가 빠지면 섭하지 이리 줘, 고마워

translation.en: -It's nice to meet a fan. -[Das] Oh, that's cute.
You wanna know what else is cute?
Because you're wanted in 18 separate countries,
I get to choose which one of them detains you until trial,
translation.ko: 재판 때까지 구금할 나라를 골라야 돼

translation.en: given your escape history.
What are you, six for six now?
Yeah. One more and I get a Shawshank jacket.
translation.ko: 응, 한 번 더 하면 쇼생크 재킷 받는대

translation.en: Keep making your jokes
because I'm about to send you to the worst place in the world.
Your Instagram account?
You know, I'm really starting to not like you.
Oh, come on!
Not like me? You don't even know me.
translation.ko: 날 안 좋아해? 잘 알지도 못하면서

translation.en: We could have a lot in common.
[scoffs] Maybe I don't know you, but I've been building a profile on you,
ever since you stole William Strang's Lady with a Red Hat from the Tate
back in 2014.
You can't prove that was me.
I got that on Etsy.
I've been tracking your scores for a while.
So let me take a crack at who I think you really are.
Sure thing. Yeah.
-Only child. -Mmm-hmm.
[Hartley] Dad's a Swiss cop, Mom's an American professor.
translation.ko: 아빠는 스위스 경찰 엄마는 미국 교수

translation.en: You started stealing between the ages of six and eight.
You found out you had a real talent for it.
It made you feel special, different.
You like to work alone. You don't like a team.
The only jobs you take are the ones that make the big, splashy headlines,
translation.ko: 화제가 될 물건만 노리는 걸 보면

translation.en: which tells me that you only do it for the thrill and not the money.
Are you insane? I love the money.
I'm not done yet. I'm just getting to the good part.
-Thank you. -You're welcome.
A lot of thieves out there who claim to only do it for the money.
translation.ko: 오직 돈이 목적이라고 말하는 도둑은 많아

translation.en: That's not unusual.
But what is unusual is the risk that you take.
The chances.
It's as though you wanna get caught so you can escape,
just to prove yourself all over again,
and prove that you're better than everybody else
and that you're worthy.
Worthy of what? This speech?
Your father's love.
Congratulations.
How'd you find me?
Well, the same way I knew that you were gonna steal the egg in Rome.
[whispers] The Bishop.
[whispers] The Bishop.
[normally] Get him ready to move.
Booth, I'm curious.
How does it feel to be sold out by the most wanted art thief in the world?
translation.ko: 최고의 예술품 도둑한테 제보 당한 기분 어때?

translation.en: I'm the most wanted art thief in the world.
You were.
[Das] Wait. Wait here.
There's no chance I'm putting that thing in the same van as him.
translation.ko: 저놈과 같은 차에 실을 순 없어요

translation.en: -See you at the airfield. -I'll see you there.
[in English] Door open.
All right. We're good.
Thank you.
Hi, there.
-You leaving town? -[Hartley] Flight's in an hour.
translation.ko: - 이제 가요? - 한 시간 후 비행기예요

translation.en: Something up?
You could say that. Hmm.
Okay. What's going on?
[chuckles] Funny, I was gonna ask you the same thing.
What are you doing with that?
Oh, this priceless piece of ancient cultural whatnot?
Booth gave us a fake egg.
I'll admit, Booth was my first thought too.
Then I asked myself, "How well do you really know someone
you only met 72 hours ago?"
And someone whose official credentials
came solely by a written interagency communiqué.
So I called up the Assistant Director of the BAU at Quantico, really nice lady.
translation.ko: 그래서 FBI 행동분석팀 부팀장과 통화했죠 상냥한 여자분이시던데 당신을 모르더군요

translation.en: She'd never heard of you.
-That's impossible. -[Das] Is it?
Yes, it's impossible.
As impossible as a John Hartley with a Swiss bank account
that received an $8 million wire transfer
from an encrypted third-party on the same day the egg was stolen?
Quite a coincidence, wouldn't you say, Agent?
[officer 2 over radio] We have eyes on target.
Listen, whatever you think this is, whatever you think I did, I didn't do.
translation.ko: 어떻게 보일지 몰라도 내 짓이 아니에요

translation.en: Someone's behind this. The Bishop, maybe even Booth himself.
-I'm being set up. -Maybe you are, maybe you're not.
Until I figure it out, I'm gonna keep you where I can find you.
Now, normally, I'm not a vindictive person, but,
well, I trusted you and you hurt my feelings.
So I picked someplace extra special.
It's a bit of a black site. Kind of the land due process forgot.
You're under arrest, Agent Hartley.
Das, look at me. Look at my eyes.
translation.ko: 다스, 날 봐요, 내 눈을 봐요

translation.en: I didn't do this.
I don't believe you.
You a top or a bottom? [grunts]
Doesn't matter. Prison's gonna decide for us.
You gotta be shittin' me.
[Booth] Well, I'll say one thing about ol' Inspector Das,
she's got a real sense of humor.
Put 'er there, roomie.
You're right, we should wash up first.
It's okay. You're safe here.
Except if they find out you're a cop. Then they're gonna wanna kill you.
translation.ko: 경찰이란 것만 숨기면 죽진 않을 거야

translation.en: [Booth] Bishop must have seen you coming from a mile away.
translation.ko: 비숍이 몇 수 앞을 보고 있던 거야

translation.en: Got your trust after selling me out.
Can't run a con without gaining the mark's trust first, that's page one.
I know how a confidence scheme works, trust me.
[Booth] Well, you do now, that's for sure.
The same mystery thief who ratted me out is the same one who framed you.
translation.ko: 날 찌른 놈이 당신을 모함한 놈이라니

translation.en: That seems like a coincidence, don't you think?
This is not a coincidence. This is a plan.
In one move, The Bishop took out her lead competitor and lead investigator.
translation.ko: 가장 위협적인 경쟁자와 수사관을 동시에 처리

translation.en: -Two birds, one stone. -Egg.
-What? -Two birds, one egg.
It's kind of a lay-up. Even Post Malone gets it.
translation.ko: 이 농담이 어려워? 저 포스트 말론도 알겠다

translation.en: This is farm-to-table, right? Thank you.
I don't understand why.
Why would The Bishop go to the trouble of framing me when she already has the egg?
I mean, what's left?
Three hundred million dollars?
You're kidding. I never heard of a price tag like that.
translation.ko: 그런 성공 보수는 들어본 적도 없어

translation.en: No one has.
But you don't understand, that's not the price for just one egg.
Here's the deal.
Whoever brings this Egyptian billionaire all three eggs
translation.ko: 알 세 개를 모아서 이집트 억만장자에게

translation.en: by the night of his daughter's wedding gets all the marbles.
translation.ko: 딸 결혼식 저녁까지 갖다주면 받는 거야

translation.en: Turns out, Mr. Big Daddy Big Bucks' daughter,
translation.ko: 이 통 큰 아빠의 따님 말인데

translation.en: guess what her name is?
Stop guessing, it's Cleopatra.
I mean, these people are horrible. But I like money, so…
translation.ko: 짜증 나는 인간들이지만 난 돈이 좋으니까…

translation.en: So how does that work?
No one knows where the third egg is. It's never been found.
translation.ko: 세 번째 알은 발견된 적도 없어

translation.en: I'm not gonna lie, that's a bit of a problem.
I was gonna deal with the second egg first.
Then the rest.
[sighs] All right, well, Bureau intel says that the second egg
translation.ko: FBI 정보에 따르면 두 번째 알을

translation.en: is owned by an international arms dealer.
Sotto Voce. I know all about this guy.
His dad tried to strangle him when he was 14.
translation.ko: 14살 때 아빠한테 목 졸려 죽을 뻔했고

translation.en: Nobody can stand this son of a bitch. [chuckles]
Apparently, it left quite the impression on him.
And strangling folks became sort of a hobby for him.
He's a big fan.
[Booth] Sotto Voce is super scary.
But he's not above having a good time.
Throws a masquerade party every year for his top buyers
translation.ko: 매년 우수 고객을 위해 가면무도회를 여는데

translation.en: in his I-probably-have-a-tiny-penis villa in Valencia.
translation.ko: 뭐가 작아 콤플렉스인지 발렌시아의 큰 빌라에서 하더라고

translation.en: Gunrunners are a little touchy about their identity.
So the Eyes Wide Shut thing takes the edge off for everyone.
Now, what none of these evil one-percenters know
is that upstairs, locked away in a secret vault,
Dr. Shirtless has in his possession
an ancient piece of pricelessness that I like to call…
translation.ko: 거기에 보관 중인 값진 고대 유물의 이름은

translation.en: Cleopatra's second egg.
And it's just begging for me to steal it.
I'd be on my way there right now if you weren't such a super cop.
translation.ko: 아직도 못 갔어 어떤 경찰 때문에!

translation.en: -Don't do that. -[whispers] What?
-Don't do that. -[whispers] Do what?
-I know what you're doing. Listen. -[whispers] I'm not doing anything.
translation.ko: - 무슨 속셈인지 알아 - 내가 뭘 했다고

translation.en: [whispering] These guys here, if they find out you're a C-O-P…
This is a room full of convicted murderers and toilet vodka enthusiasts.
We gotta make sure they know you're not a cop.
-[yelling] Nyet politsiya. -[in English] Listen to me. I beg…
Guys? Nyet politsiya. Not a cop.
This man is not a cop, all right?
Get that through your thick skulls right now!
He's a profiler for the FBI,
which does fall under the umbrella of law enforcement, but not a cop.
It's similar, but it's not the same thing. It's a complicated backstory.
translation.ko: 비슷한데 같진 않아 사연이 좀 복잡해

translation.en: This is our good friend, Special Agent John Hartley.
translation.ko: 우리의 좋은 친구 존 하틀리 요원

translation.en: Let's give him a warm welcome to the prison, guys.
Thank you, guys. [whispering] I don't think anyone heard me. We're good.
All's quiet on the western front.
-Nobody's… Oh, no. -[objects clattering]
[Booth] Yep. Drago Grande heard. Here he comes.
[whispering] Okay, be cool. Don't embarrass me.
[normally] Hello, sir.
Politsiya.
You die.
[whispering] Okay, he knows.
He knows you're a cop.
The jig is up.
[whispering] It's okay.
You can have mine. You need some nourishment.
[whispering] You should get up. You look like a little bitch right now.
I say that as a friend.
Okay, look.
I don't wanna do the whole prison fight thing with you…
translation.ko: 감옥 난투 같은 거 벌일 생각 없어

translation.en: -[soft] You got this. I'm in your corner. -So please, no fight.
translation.ko: 할 수 있어, 내가 있잖아 그러니까 싸우지 말자고

translation.en: Let's just go back and finish our meals.
-No. No-- -[guard in Russian] Back to your cell!
[Booth in English] God…
All that working out.
You still get your ass spanked by a toothless man with tuberculosis--
translation.ko: 폐병 걸린 영감한테 그렇게 처맞을 거면…

translation.en: Okay. Okay.
If you ever pull shit like that again, it'll be the last thing you do.
translation.ko: 또 그랬다간 그 길로 죽는 거야

translation.en: Right.
-You don't know me, Booth. -No.
You have no idea what I'm capable of.
Okay. Thank God, you're here.
[in Russian] The captain wants to see you. Let's go!
[in English] Him?
Oh, no, us. Okay.
Hello, boys.
Oh, my God.
You're the captain?
You might benefit from a little career change. [chuckles]
I mean, I'm… I don't think runway,
but definitely regional catalog work, fliers…
She's The Bishop.
No shit, dipdick!
It's so nice to finally meet you, Mr. Booth.
Such a thrill to be face-to-face
with the second-best art thief in the world.
Oh, I see what you did there. That's… [chuckles]
Yeah, you got lucky a couple of times early on, you know?
But you can't name one time in the past year that you beat me.
-Helsinki. -My parachute failed.
Jakarta.
-My Segway sank. -Macau.
Nobody knew that Miley Cyrus was going to be there.
It was a completely unannounced show.
You can have excuses or results.
-[whispers] Not both. -[scoffs]
What are we doing here? What do you want?
To have a chat.
First of all, Agent Hartley,
please accept my sincerest apologies for the whole mix-up in Rome.
You see, after I stole the egg in Bali,
I then made an $8 million deposit into an account registered in your name.
translation.ko: 당신 명의로 만든 계좌에 8백만 달러를 넣었지

translation.en: Then, all I had to do was sit back and wait for Das to take the bait.
A few clever keystrokes and a well-timed call intercept.
[The Bishop] FBI BAU Director's office.
And poof. [gasps]
[mockingly] Bye-bye, Agent John Hartley.
Hello, suspicious suspect.
Funny, don't you think?
Shut up. You deleted my life.
And now I'm stuck in a cell with this idiot.
Well, down to business then.
At the risk of stating the obvious,
I have the first egg in my possession,
translation.ko: 첫 번째 알은 내 수중에 있고

translation.en: and in less than 48 hours, I'm gonna have the second one as well.
But that leaves an issue. The final egg.
Well, too bad for you. Nobody knows where the third egg is.
He didn't tell you?
You didn't tell him?
-Didn't tell me what? -I don't know what she's talking about.
translation.ko: - 뭘 안 해? - 무슨 소린지 모르겠네

translation.en: Your cellmate here knows exactly where the third egg is.
translation.ko: 당신 감방 동기가 세 번째 알의 위치를 알아

translation.en: She's lying. I do not know where the third egg is. I swear to God.
[Booth] I know where the third egg is. I swear to God.

What the f--

Oh, bummer. I really wanted to do it the easy way.

[lazily] No, don't. Wait.
Oh, my God!
Well…
[Hartley] No.

No.
No. Don't--

translation.en: I could read hieroglyphics before I could read English.

Guard!

And scene.
Long con?
Long con.

Now I'd really love to stay and see how this whole thing turns out,

translation.en: but I'm late for a date with a very large pyramid.
Can't wait to see what happens next.
So exciting!
She's a good singer.

Jesus! That's really scary.
[Booth, distorted] Oh, you look busted. You look like a zombie.

This is your fault. She was mine.

We're really gonna do it.

-I lied. -What do you mean, "you lied"?

Look, the point is, is that the third egg isn't in Egypt.

[softly] Pretty please?
Thoughts?
You hear that?
Hey, hey, hey.
Up here.

Don't run?

Riding the rails hobo-style.

You wanna do it?
Do it.

We're not that different.

Help me catch The Bishop and clear my name,

Please.
April, 1945.
The Red Army's at the gate, days from taking Berlin.
It's game over for the Nazis,
and that's when a forgotten Mr. Nobody named Rudolph Zeich,
Hitler's personal art and antiquities dealer,
and the only man ever rumored to have held Cleopatra's third egg in his hands,
translation.ko: 세 번째 알의 소유자라는 루머가 있던 유일한 인물이야

and travel halfway around the globe,
with nearly 100 tons of so-called machine parts?
For 70 years, amateur sleuths, treasure hunters,
translation.ko: 70년 동안 전 세계의 아마추어 탐정, 보물 사냥꾼

translation.en: and adult virgins everywhere became obsessed with this question,
translation.ko: 총각 딱지 못 뗀 어른들이 이 질문에 집착했지

And my dad was one of them.

poring over old maps and declassified files.

translation.en: Holidays, he'd drive hours away to obscure auctions,

Faith?

translation.ko: 그 믿음을 근거로 정글 한복판에 있다고?

X marks the spot.

Oh, shit!

-That's the problem. -Oh. That is not kind.

Oh, shit!
You have got to be kidding.

Uh, fun with magnets. All right.
Dad…
Please be good crazy.

translation.ko: 내가 훔치면 절도고 네가 훔치면 아니야?

Too bad it was driven by Nazi scum.

Who's your daddy?
[Hartley] That's not how it goes.
[Booth] I know.
Well, labels, Nazis, dum-dums.
Five-second rule.
It's fine. Totally fine. Not a scratch on it.
Are you sure you don't wanna flip this one? I got a guy.

Egypt? [scoffs]

So, uh, hand it over.
Come on, don't be shy.
[mockingly] Good job. Attaboy.
Drop your weapon!
[in Spanish] This way! On that side.
[in English] How did she find us?
I followed you. She must have followed me.
No shit!
Why are you shooting at them? I thought you were on their side.

How are we gonna get out of here?
We take that.
I don't think that's gonna make it up the stairs.
-[cocks gun] -It ain't going up the stairs.
Cover us.
-Go, go, go! -I'm trying!
Let's go.
Let's go!
-Throw it. -What?
Now!
[Das in Spanish] You two with me, the rest of you follow.
Go!
[in English] I'm all out.
[in Spanish] Pull over!

[in English] Bishop, the egg!
[Booth] You saved me.

We're running out of road.
Hold on to something! If we stop, they'll catch us.

translation.en: Make sure to kick clear of the car.

translation.ko: 일단 진지하게 회의 좀 하자! 제기랄!

translation.en: It's just like we drew it up, right?
Hartley?
Hartley?
Hartley?
You will be missed.
Oh, shit! God damn it.
Hartley?
Hartley? Hartley?
Hey, where are you, you big idiot?
[Hartley] Who are you calling an idiot?
I'm right here.
-Did you just choose me over the egg? -No.
-Well, it kinda looks like you did. -I didn't.
You went running in there to rescue me.
I left my phone in there.
You only have a finite amount of time to save it.
Stick it in a bag of rice, it's a whole thing.
translation.ko: 쌀 봉지에다 넣고 난리를 쳐야 돼

translation.en: You thought I was dead.
I didn't think you were dead. I wished you were dead.
translation.ko: 그런 생각 안 했어, 죽었으면 했지

translation.en: I saw you splashing around. "Hartley! Hartley!"
Yes, okay, I wanted to pull you out,

translation.ko: 이런 걸로 호들갑 떨진 않을 거야

translation.en: I'm not gonna gloat. It's not who I am.
Would some people say that this is very embarrassing for you?
Yes, of course. Of course they would.
Probably everybody.
But that's not important right now.
What's important is that you realize you lost and I won.
We.
We won. Together. Friendship. Teamwork.

Checkmate.
Oh, that feels good.
I've got two eggs, you've got one, and you think you won?
translation.ko: 난 알이 두 개인데 당신이 이겼다고?

translation.en: That's the best part of this whole thing.

translation.ko: 세 번째 알만 내 거면 당신은 못 이겨

translation.en: I don't care about the money anymore.
Honestly, look at your face right now.
That face right there. Just… Yeah. Perfect.
translation.ko: 바로 저 표정, 그래, 딱 좋아

translation.en: Resting failure face. I mean, in a word, priceless.
translation.ko: 떨떠름하게 썩은 표정 돈 주고도 못 볼걸

translation.en: Also, it just gets better.
As an added bonus, my friend here, at no extra charge,
translation.ko: 보너스로 내 친구가 추가 요금 없이

translation.en: is gonna give you a lifetime supply of prison.
translation.ko: 평생 감옥 숙박을 제공해 줄 거야

translation.en: So… [in accent] That's-a nice.
-Stand up. -Stand up.
Told you how this was gonna end.
You're right. I am the bad guy.
I know how a confidence scheme works, trust me.
You don't know me, Booth.
You have no idea what I'm capable of.
What the fuck?
Look at him.
Resting failure face. Priceless.
translation.ko: 떨떠름하게 썩은 표정 돈 주고도 못 보지

translation.en: This whole time you were working for her?
Not for, with.
-Like partners. -Yeah, we're both The Bishop.
Has he told you where the third egg is yet?
-I love you. -I love you too.
-Ready? [grunts] -Yep.
Surprise!
There are two bishops in chess.
-And a whole lotta pawns. -Hmm.
[Hartley] I passed the first egg on to her in Bali.
She took the second egg from Sotto Voce.
And the third egg, well, the only way for us to get our hands on it
translation.ko: 세 번째 알을 우리 손에 넣으려면

translation.en: was if you led us right to it, which you did.
I thought for sure you were gonna see through my
"We're not partners, I gotta clear my name,
I'm Johnny Law, blah, blah, blah."
To be honest, I thought I laid it on too thick in the prison.
-No, honey, you were so good. -No? Really?
Appreciate that. What'd you think? You think it was too much?
I have notes. Otherwise, pretty good.
translation.ko: 살짝 티 났어, 그거 빼곤 괜찮더라

translation.en: "Pretty good"? All right.
Let's just rewind for one second here.
You electrocuted him. You went "Downtown."
Yes. By the way, that hurt like hell.
I know. I'm so sorry. I had to.
No.
[The Bishop] It was the only way I could pass you a key to slip the cuffs.
translation.ko: 그래야 수갑 열쇠를 줄 수 있었거든

translation.en: [sputtering] How did you get free?
Well, anyhoo, the egg.
The egg.
That gun is soaking wet. There's no way--
I'm not a Navy SEAL.
Third egg.
-Thank you. -Let's take a walk.
So it was all a lie? Even the sob story about your dad?
No. My dad was a con man, and I hated him.
translation.ko: 아니, 진짜 사기꾼이었고 난 아버지 싫어했어

translation.en: So I decided to become better than he ever was.
Beat him at his own game.
Booth, don't be too hard on yourself.
You're good, really good, better than most.
We got nothing but respect for you.
Better luck next time.
[The Bishop] We'd love to stay and chat, but we have an important wedding to attend
translation.ko: 수다 떨고 싶지만 중요한 결혼식에 참석해야 하거든

translation.en: and it turns out, we have the perfect gift.
translation.ko: 알고 보니 우리한테 완벽한 선물이 있더라고

translation.en: [Hartley] No hard feelings, pal.
It's what we do.
[clicks tongue] None taken. Super fun time, guys.
See, I always appreciate a quality double-cross.
Serious question though, you guys have any sunblock?
I have no base. This is a spray tan.
[man] A beautiful event like tonight happens only once in a father's life.
translation.ko: 이런 아름다운 행사는 아버지 인생에 한 번뿐이라

translation.en: That is why when I arranged for my only daughter to marry,
I spared no expense to acquire a gift unlike any other.
A gift fit for a queen,
my Cleopatra.
Behold, for the first time in two millennia,
all three treasured eggs have been reunited.
translation.ko: 보물 알 세 개가 한데 모였습니다

translation.en: [gasps] Oh, my God! Ed…
[Cleopatra] Ed Sheeran!
I love you!
Ed Sheeran, who knew?
God, he's so cute.
Yeah, I like that guy.
[male officer] Attention. This is an Interpol police action.
Remain in your seats. This will be over shortly.
What are you doing?
-Cheers. -Cheers.
-Oh, my God. Don't touch me. Excuse me! -Oi!
Come on, then. Come on! Come on!
We'll take those. Thank you very much.
-Let's get out of here. -[chuckles softly]
Possession of stolen Nazi loot is a crime.
You're under arrest, father of the bride.
This is outrageous.
[both grunting] Get off me. Do you know who I am?
I was in Game of Thrones!
I'm Ed Sheeran, bitch!
[Booth] This gouda is disappointing.
Such a fancy yacht, you'd think they could stock some decent cheeses.
translation.ko: 이런 고급 요트면 좋은 것 좀 쟁여놓지

translation.en: That's not cheese. That's uncooked pork.
I've heard tapeworms can be quite slimming.
Surprised to see me?
Well, we're just surprised it took you so long to find us.
Oh, I actually… I came aboard yesterday.
You weren't the only one crying at the end of your lovemaking.
You know, funny story, after Das picked me up on the beach…
Looks like you ran out of friends.
[Booth] She sent me to the only place on Earth that actually is worse
translation.ko: 그 여자 인스타 피드보다 더 끔찍한 곳으로 호송됐지

translation.en: than her Instagram account.
But then I remembered
that I'm pretty good at escaping from things.
So I did.
Look, am I upset about what happened back on the beach?
translation.ko: 그 해변에서의 일 마음에 담고 있냐고?

translation.en: Absolutely not. All's fair in love and eggs.
I came to congratulate you both.
Great. Glad you approve. What do you want?
translation.ko: 인정해 주니 고맙군 원하는 게 뭔데?

translation.en: Well, I'm big on forgiveness. I always have been.
But I'm not so big on forget-ness.
What are you talking about?
I'm talking about my twist ending.
You know the 300 million you guys got on the eggs
before you double-crossed the billionaire?
Nice touch, by the way.
Anyhow, I gave our friend, Inspector Das, a little jingle
and I tipped her off about that secure Cayman Island account you stashed it in.
translation.ko: 그 돈 넣은 케이맨 제도 보안 계좌를 찔러줬어

translation.en: Turns out, it's not as secure as one might hope.
Take it all.
[Booth] See? Now, we're even.
Everyone loses, no one gets the money and we can all be friends again.
translation.ko: 모두가 패자이자 개털이지 다시 친구가 된 거야

translation.en: Cut the shit. What's the offer?
There's a new score.
Double the payout, triple the challenge, plus, here's the best part.
translation.ko: 보수는 2배, 난이도 3배 그리고 가장 중요한 거

translation.en: It's a three-thief job. [mouthing] One, two, three.
And let me guess, if we don't say yes,
then Inspector Das is on her way right now to arrest us.
Yes, in very fast boats.
Know what I think is funny, Booth?
Vin Diesel's audition tape for Cats? It exists.
translation.ko: 빈 디젤의 '캣츠' 오디션 영상? 그거 진짜 있어

translation.en: The fact that you think the two of us would ever team up with you.
translation.ko: 우리가 팀이 돼줄 거라고 생각한다는 점이야

translation.en: Get off the boat.
Great. I'll, uh, send you both a sharpened toothbrush.
Wait, stop.
[sighs] Look, we need a new score now anyway.
I know he drives you crazy, but he's good.
-And you two work well together. -No, we don't.
We kinda do.
Do you trust me?
Always.
-You love me? -Big time.
That's all we need.
[both] What are we stealing?
This.
[in Italian] It's abandoned. They're not here.
Ready?
What could possibly go wrong?
Everything.
[The Bishop] Don't miss me too much.
[sing-song] Ta-ta!
